data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Masaka that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Masaka, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Masaka, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 33 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Masaka, Uganda.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Masaka to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Masaka. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Aringa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Aringa people.
God, we pray for the believers in Masaka, Uganda that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Masaka, Uganda a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 34,441 believers in the state of Masaka to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

location.name: Masaka
location.people_groups_list: Plains Bira, Gujarati, Kaliko, Nubian, Nyang'i
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Plains Bira (2,000), Gujarati (465,000), Kaliko (13,000), Nubian (37,000), Nyang'i (18,000)
